ygData.subject: broken spells, etc
ygData.msgSnippet: wtf?  i think necros have the largest percentage of broken and useless spells of any class.  not only that, but we have a huge gap in the number of quests we
ygData.messageBody:
wtf? i think necros have the largest percentage of broken and useless
spells of any class. not only that, but we have a huge gap in the number of
quests we can do, and too many items mimic our spells.

>BTW, is intensify death really broken. Feel kinda stupid casting it all the
> time for the last few weeks.

then they took away charm and gave us a worthless spell (screaming terror),
not only is it a 'why go to the train when you can bring the train to you'
spell, but it only works indoors! at least if it worked outdoors, when the
wipe failed it wouldnt really be as dangerous.

and what were they thinking when they made voice graft? i dont think any
class has a more useless spell.

oh well, thats my rant =)

>Also had a general question about experience and which is better to do. Is
>it better to solo a yellow spawn every other time it comes up (lets say
>alternating with an equal level friend) or group with your friend and kill
>each one and split the exp?

you are better off getting 50% of two kills than 100% of one, there is less
work involved, and more safety. also, you get some form of grouping bonus.

belphenor
